website_summaries.verdict: This is a small, but sensitive sound level meter that you can easily take with you wherever you go.
pros: Compact device that's easy to hold in your hand
Large, backlit display for easy reading
Sensitive microphone easily picks up sound
cons: Power button is prone to turning on and off when inside your bag

customer_reviews.title: Great little sound meter for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This thing seems to work good. I am no expert on sound, but wanted it to see the difference between two sets of speakers. The unit seems to be well constructed and so far has held up nicely. Although I don't use it regularly, it is a great tool to have when setting up your surround sound system. The backlight is also a great touch, since it is dark in some of these theaters.
customer_reviews.author: Smokey

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for tuning my home theater system, and it worked well. My receiver automatically adjusted the speaker levels but it seemed like the left speakers were always louder. Bought this and used it to re-calibrate my system and it is WAY better now. Sure enough this registered the left speakers as louder. I didn't see it mentioned in the description, but this also has a "min" and "max" button on the side which will display the min and max levels detected. Also it has a 15 minute period before it auto shuts off, and has a light sensor to light up the display. Back side has a screw for mounting to a tripod. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: asev

customer_reviews.title: not reference quality, but "good enough"
customer_reviews.text: for $30 I wasn't expecting reference precision. This is a fun toy for an engineer to keep at home and see how actual sounds in his environment actually relate to published levels which cause, for example, permanent hearing damage. I don't have a reference to be able to guess at how accurate it is, but the *precision* isn't much better than 6dB. That is, it might show 85dB near your speakers, and then you slowly turn up the volume and it jumps right to 91dB. I probably won't use it to tune my stereo EQ, but it's a fun thing to keep around.
customer_reviews.author: sempervirens

customer_reviews.title: Want to know how loud that noise is?
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect much and was rewarded with a device that exceeded mightily my expectations. I bought this device to determine whether the claim made by a dishwasher maker was accurate. The dishwasher was quiet and the decibel level fell right in line with the advertised claim. We have loud motorcycles in the area as well as loud woodworking machines in my workshop, so now at least I know how loud all the mechanical helpers are as well as the neighborhood irritants. It's a worthwhile buy.
customer_reviews.author: william mueller

customer_reviews.title: NICE TO HAVE AROUND
customer_reviews.text: My son has recently suffered with hyperacusis which is hyper sensitivity to noise. He has resorted to carrying this around with him to make sure he doesn't subject himself to noises that are too loud as he is afraid he will injure his hearing. It works quite well, is easy to operate, and easy to see. There are some frequencies we feel it doesn't pick up, but we're not sure about that. I would recommend this to anyone. The price is very reasonable and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mary

customer_reviews.title: Sound Level Meter really works
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to prove to my Oxygen Generator provider how loud this one is. According to the manufacturer, it should be no louder than 40 decibles. Mine runs 63.. A newer model only runs 30 decibles so I will take the meter, and print outs of the internet findings to the medical rental agency and have a talk. Wish me luck....they shouldn't mess with old ladies!
customer_reviews.author: PatD

customer_reviews.title: Great db meter
customer_reviews.text: This db meter has already effected responses from the audience of how loud the speakers had been. Now I am walk around discreetly testing especially near the speakers where people are sitting and determiine whether indeed the db level is too loud and command adjusts for each speaker accordingly. This unit fits in my breast pocket and is easy to turn on and use. The small size with large display makes it especially easy to use. I strongly recommend this inexpensive unit.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to test sound levels in my car before and after a sound deadening project. I haven't finished the project yet, but I did use it this meter before I started, and it worked fine. I guess it's accurate, but I have nothing to compare it to. I will just be comparing my before and after results, so even if it's a little off, I should still be able to see the change. At this price, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Handy little gadget
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this primarily to check sound levels at house parties where there was concern of violating noise level ordinances, and it's perfect for that. The backlit screen is easy to see, and I've found it to be fairly accurate (as best I can tell). As others have noted, since the activation button isn't recessed, you can switch it on without realizing, but I have no desire to carry this around in my pocket anyway, so that doesn't effect me. Bottom line, it's a handy gadget that gets the job done and helps keep me and my friends from disturbing the neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Kalamon

customer_reviews.title: So easy, a kid can use it!
customer_reviews.text: This meter is so easy to use! We bought it for our 8-year-old to use for a school science project and it's a great little measuring device. The simple buttons, the relatively large screen, and the max-reading feature are all great. It really helps give perspective on what might be damaging our hearing in our everyday lives. I didn't want to spend hundreds of dollars on a device since I didn't need OSHA-level performance. The price point was appropriate for this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great price for occasional use. In my church we had problem balancing the music sound level in various spots. I bought this one at a great price and use it to find the sweet spots of the room and also the comfort level of the sound pressure. I have inexperienced people run around the room and stand still to reset the device and take readings. They have no problem using it and I get the results I need.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. GREEN

customer_reviews.title: Rocks out in church
customer_reviews.text: When I started attending one of the North Point churches with Andy Stanley, I found the worship team to be loud. So loud in fact that I came back with silicone ear plugs AND this sound meter for the 9 a.m. service. 110 decibels!! Too loud but at least I confirmed it and for a price that didn't hurt my wallet or ears. BTW: The bands are great!
customer_reviews.author: Tom S

customer_reviews.title: Strong built. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This a very good quality unit over all. Plastic casing feels very tight, Buttons push very firm, backlight sensor works very well, Unit performs very well, even a 9V battery is included. I got 0 complaint about this unit. The price was absolutely fantastic for this quality. Very highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Item works well.  Unfortunately, all instructions (packaging) are in Japanese!!!???
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately, this is not rocket science (the device); thus, having packaging and instructions in Japanese is going to have minimal impact... however, as there may be some features of the device that have not been "discovered" thus far, it would be nice to know that all capabilities are being used to their fullest.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with its precision as it duplicated results when compared ...
customer_reviews.text: Item performs as advertised. Very happy with its precision as it duplicated results when compared with a NIST calibrated unit. It would be nice if the data could be downloaded into an Excel spreadsheet or equivalent DAQ software.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: So crucial to get one of these for setting up a subwoofer with your audio system. You might think you can do it by ear...you can't The changes are extremely subtle but very important for setting the phase on your subwoofer properly so that it blends well with your speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Horne

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this product with no specific purpose other than to measure sound levels around the house. It does what it states it does and is very simple to operate. Has help manage the sound levels of Home theatre and music below the 86 decibel level to prevent hearing damage. Compact unit you can carry around to wherever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little sound meter
customer_reviews.text: This sound meter works good and seems to be well built. I don't know how accurate it is, I just use it for general decibel readings for work and home. I like the high and low reading hold button. The wind sock is easily lost, it does come off very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This told us the sound level at the music in the park events. It is simple and works well for a non-scientific measurement. Before we got it, the music was blasting so loud we would stay on the other side of the park and it was still loud. Interestingly, just after we got it, the operators of the sound kept the music down to a reasonable level. Apparently, others had these sound level meters, too.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma B.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MINY DECIBEL METER!
customer_reviews.text: great for quick sound readings! battery lasts a long while.... only downside to this is if you have this in your pocket... it may turn on and waist battery power. but it has a automatic 10min off if you forget to turn it off! worth the price WILL BUY ANOTHER SOON :)
customer_reviews.author: Иiск Р

customer_reviews.title: Hubby Happy
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Husb. With hearing problem thought computer fan was very loud. Now he can measure the actual noise level. C
customer_reviews.author: Carlene R.

customer_reviews.title: Sound Meter
customer_reviews.text: This little unit does a great job! I use it to equalize the volume on the presets I create on my guitar processing gear. I play on a worship team and it is important for the volume of different presets to be consistent. This sound meter does the job well! I would definitely recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nov

customer_reviews.title: Mini Digital Sound Level Meter
customer_reviews.text: I love this little gadget and, as others have stated, it is super easy to use. However, I have to agree with another reviewer. The "on" button should be recessed because the device turns on from the slightest pressure or bump. Twice it was on without my even being aware that it was. This flaw is why I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Sue

customer_reviews.title: Too sensitve
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to measure a band's decibel level for banquet hall. It was calculating 3 people talking as too much noise. When the band started there was barely a difference between the 3 people talking and a 4-piece band. I think I need something more professional
customer_reviews.author: Connie Brown

customer_reviews.title: I like this little meter.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to check the noise levels of household things like appliances, power tools, mowers, etc. Gives you a real education on how really noisy things are. I like this little meter. Even checked it against an industry standard calibrator, it's pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: spongella

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Gadget
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Proved points with it. I was surprised at how much noise people can make. Decibel readings were not as quick as an expensive device and it did not pick up very low volumes, but for the money it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: MBMarin

customer_reviews.title: I bought it to measure sound at movie theatres. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to measure sound at movie theatres. It did that job very well, but it's not a professional instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Walton

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked as good as it looks
customer_reviews.text: First impression was, 'wow, what a deal!' The product looks very nicely made. I can forgive the packaging being written in all Chinese with a small English manual included, this is just a simple on/off proposition. Problem is the thing doesn't work. Yes, it detects ambient sound levels, but no reasonable amount of noise or yelling generates an increase. Maybe it's just programmed to show ~45dB on the display and everything else is smoke and mirrors...
customer_reviews.author: larryw

customer_reviews.title: Chinese dB meter
customer_reviews.text: My version of this dB meter ordered from Amazon shipped from AmoVee Beauty. They shipped me a model designed for the Chinese Market, with all packaging and instructions only in Chinese. It seems simple enough to use, but since I can't read the instructions, I'm not sure if there are any features I'm missing out on. Since the product description and other reviews don't seem to comment on the instructions being in Chinese, I'm guessing this a problem with this specific Marketplace vendor.
customer_reviews.author: NuviOwner

customer_reviews.title: Short, sweet and to the point.
customer_reviews.text: I really just wanted something that was small, easy to operate, and gave me a straight answer when taking readings for my mobile PA system. This was exactly what I needed. It's accurate, and the max/min setting is a necessary bonus. Unlike some other meters I've handled, it gives an accurate read no matter how you're holding it in reference to the sound you're measuring. Great little product!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Semanie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. The lock in feature to hold the highest reading is a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be accurate. I just don't like that its on off switch can easily be switched on when it sits in your drawer and something easily accidentally presses the button on and then burns out the battery. Also, the foam cover falls off too easily. Otherwise it does the job. I am just being a little critical here.
customer_reviews.author: The Real Rater

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Got this to check various noise levels for home and work and it works great. Good to find out where you might want to consider hearing protection or relocating yourself to a different area.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B.

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because our band was on tour and a couple of the venues stated we had to remain at or below a certain SPL. This provided us with the perfect tool for me to level our sound system as well as show the owner we were within his request. Didnt matter because he loved the music once we got going and asked us to turn it up! HA! But this is a perfect, cheap tool to have in your band toolbox. It's good to know how loud you are being as well.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: mighty little meter
customer_reviews.text: I use this in speech therapy for the past 3 years. It's a mighty little sound level meter, the kids love it and it's easy to use. It's survived quite a few accidental drops!
customer_reviews.author: JLC

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: from the moment you turn it on it works amazingly. love the fact you can put it on a tripod. the modes are a little confusing to understand at first but really just turn it on and go was good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: KittyG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use is ver simple and gives a clear metric of the noise on a particular room If you are in a office, classroom or even to check your neigboor noise is very useful and for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: It seems accurate, and jives with the noise levels I would expect for my power tools. It's easy to use, and the price is right. I'm satisfied with the noise meter, and the shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Gadget
customer_reviews.text: I had my friend test this sound meter up against his far more expensive one. It is surprisingly accurate for the price I paid for it. I recommend the item to anyone that needs an occasional "sound check" or has need to monitor on a limited time basis - I say this because one of the features I like is that it will shut itself off after a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: belizabeth4

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive decibel measurement
customer_reviews.text: Great value, if all you want to do is measure decibels. I am a musician and I play lots of different halls and lounges, so I use it to be sure my PA system volume is around 93, at the speaker. Very easy to use. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good for My Use
customer_reviews.text: Even thought the receiver will do this am using this to double check. Is it right on the money, probably not but for general use where close counts. It was also good to settle an argument on what's really loud.
customer_reviews.author: bmac32

customer_reviews.title: measuring db
customer_reviews.text: Simple. Hope it is accurate. Arrived quickly with battery included. Need it to prove loud disturbing machine noise. Manufacturer's claimed noise level was far below what I found.
customer_reviews.author: paul richter

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Bought This Easy To Use Meter
customer_reviews.text: Despite what another review says, this easy to use item is really accurate (something like within 3.5 decibels). It's priced well and great for home use. I have used the meter to objectively monitor how loud the TV is playing. (It's quieter than I thought!) :) It has a nice max feature so you can leave it running for a little while and see how loud something is over a short period of time. I love it! No regrets! :)
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: It works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Nice SLP meter for the money. Pretty accurate, too. It seems to drain the battery even when it's off. I had to remove the battery when I don't use the device.
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Helped with an annoying neighbor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this meter after my neighbor reported me as a noise violation for the third time. In the State of Texas, a noise nuance is defined as anything over 85Db. With this sound level meter, I can prove that the noise outside my apartment is 70Db, well within the legal limit. It has a Max and Min feature, which is especially helpful for this because the instantaneous sound level changes continuously. Now, my apartment's courtesy officer has a good reason to ignore my annoying neighbor.
customer_reviews.author: Dorasil

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this device
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to set up my hme theather, balancing the volume to each speaker. worked GREAT. Great value. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: thomas kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: no more loud  generators
customer_reviews.text: worked just fine to prove the level of noise from a generator.
customer_reviews.author: Dale J.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomplicated
customer_reviews.text: This sound meter is accurate and inexpensive.I love the fact that it is so easy to use that a 5 year old could read the directions once and easily understand how to work it.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell E. Davis

customer_reviews.title: useless
customer_reviews.text: We tried to cheap out and it cost us, this meter has a nice display but nowhere near the functionality of the radio shack version for the same price. We broke down and bought a professional one.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Huschka

customer_reviews.title: Functions as expected.
customer_reviews.text: For the cost it does a great job within it's limitations. I will use it to judge Karaoke and for that it works fine, no complaints except it is easy to loose the foam cover.
customer_reviews.author: Rick101

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I used it a dozen times and it is shot.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: on/off switch sucks. battery goes quick due to accidental switching on
customer_reviews.text: on/off switch sucks. battery goes quick due to accidental switching on.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Alvidrez

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: simple, fairly accurate way to measure sound levels. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great little sound checker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mostly for techy curiosity, however this device is quite useful to make sure that when I'm cranking my tunes inside I don't annoy the neighbors outside.
customer_reviews.author: squinja7000

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to prove to my pissy neighbor that I was withing legal noise limits with my motorcycle. Needless to say he has no leg to stand on, and still gets awoken at 5:30 every morning!
customer_reviews.author: JASON FRASER

customer_reviews.title: Straightforward device
customer_reviews.text: Simple & easy decibel meter. Works well. I purchased this for use in our local House of Prayer to set sound levels from the sound booth.
customer_reviews.author: HHK

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for someone who has visual impairment. It does not have a fast/slow mode, so it must take some effort to know how to use it. The numbers were very easy to read, so it fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Fern

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money - but everything is in Mandarin (Chinese)
customer_reviews.text: All in all, the db meter works very well. My only complaint is that ALL of the packaging and instructions are in Mandarin (Chinese). I don't speak or read Mandarin, so have no idea what it says. Vendor, I would appreciate if you provided a copy of the instructions in English so that I know how to use and care for my db meter.
customer_reviews.author: Chica N Choi

customer_reviews.title: Seems great!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work very well. I used this to check my exhaust and sound system volume, and it's nice to have an objective measurement of how loud they are!
customer_reviews.author: mcbooks001

customer_reviews.title: Excellent digital sound level meter
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent digital sound level meter for the price your pay for it. Readings are reliable when compared to other more expensive units. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. N

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money, received in a timely manner
customer_reviews.author: Sharp shooter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound Meter
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent sound meter for the price. Appears to be very accurate with the attributes of a much more expensive meter.
customer_reviews.author: Garry57

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I bought this so long ago and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I bought this so long ago and I don't think I've replaced the batteries yet, so it's very low maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Heinbokel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and appears to be accurate
customer_reviews.text: A handy device for measuring noise level. Easy to use and appears to be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. White

customer_reviews.title: durable and good quality despite being a little-known brand
customer_reviews.text: Accurate, durable and good quality despite being a little-known brand. Does the job properly
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Gil A

customer_reviews.title: mini digitalsound level meter
customer_reviews.text: gave as gift was what the person requested. he thought it was great, he was using it while we where there
customer_reviews.author: Diana Migliaccio

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We do a lot of silencer testing and this is just what I have needed to evaluate the work we do here.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: there was a really loud sound at school and I tolt the administrators that next time I would know how loud was it
customer_reviews.author: canoe4ever

customer_reviews.title: Good Instrument for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This was used on a project trying different muffler configurations to silence my ATV - it worked well for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Groff

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Need
customer_reviews.text: The meter does exactly what I need it for -- to measure my voice level, when doing exercises to keep my vocal cords flexible. It's compact, simple to operate, with an easy to read digital display. I'm glad I didn't have to pay more for a model with more "bells and whistles" than I require.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Bader

customer_reviews.title: A Helpful Tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool turned out to be a toy. I can check my progress daily. The size makes it easy to keep near me. However, it is difficult for me to hold because my disease limitts the use of my hands. I had it mounted on a small metal stand, and noww work with it from my walker or s tablle.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Koleson

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Turns on randomly
customer_reviews.text: All the modes described work as designed. I'm glad I got this instead of the more expensive kind. The only Con is that the power button is hit easily. So you can't just drop it in a bag and go, it'll turn on and run down the battery. The auto off feature is nice to help curve that though.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi

customer_reviews.title: Good sound meter
customer_reviews.text: Functional and basic. Works well for non-complicated use. No troubles with operation or read out of the screen. I would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. The build quality is good and I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. The build quality is good and I have no complaints whatsoever. Would have been nice to have an averaging feature.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Yuan

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product because it registers at 60 dB even when it's quiet in a room which to me means it's not very accurate. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Potts

customer_reviews.title: Neede to Test Fire Alarm db Level
customer_reviews.text: I needed to test the fire alarm db level in my classroom and I didn't want to spend a small fortune. This was a good instrument for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Trudeau

customer_reviews.title: Great for an inexpensive unit
customer_reviews.text: Did exactly what it was supposed to. Great for an inexpensive unit.
customer_reviews.author: Speedball

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Setting Up the right volume in every gig it's important to me. And this tool make my life more easy.
customer_reviews.author: Freddy J. Ramos Duben a.k.a. DJ Duben De Fresh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband said it was a great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Precious

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: This product meets my expectations 100%. If you need an instrument for a quick check of sound level, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Andrei Chugunov

customer_reviews.title: Sound reader
customer_reviews.text: Its seems to be pertty true. Nice little meter to carry around the shop and check the DB's so that they can get check monthly.
customer_reviews.author: Randle Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: Soo GOOd
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this sound level meter and i was really impressed with it. I had to use it for my science fair project, but it was really compact and accurate. This is a must have product.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Lee

customer_reviews.title: overall,  very pleased
customer_reviews.text: As described...and for the money spent, I am quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Good device, quality questionable.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, you cant go wrong. If you just want to see what the ambient noise is in an area, it works great. For specific application, I would recommend a more sensitive and precise device (which of course will cost more.)
customer_reviews.author: markg_srt4

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this digital sound level meter in order to use it for a school science fair project. It arrived promptly and worked perfectly. The battery needed was even included. It was very simple to use. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Solid sound meter in small package
customer_reviews.text: Opened the package, put in the battery, and it works. It measures sound level with precision - same results every time - although I have no way of knowing accuracy of the measurement. Satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Raf13

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it!
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat this meter for the price, . I had reservations about the low cost but I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: fumon

customer_reviews.title: Mini Digital Sound level meter
customer_reviews.text: I got this meter and the instructions were in Chinese. It took a couple of days searching to find a vendor who could email me the instructions in English. I've had the meter about 1 week and it no longer works. When I turn it on, the decibel reading descends to about ~25dB's and stays there. Tried remove/reinstall the battery, and use the max/min button, but nothing works. You get what you pay for. I would not recommend this product. Spent the money and get a better meter.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The sound meter was easy to use and at a very reasonable price. I recommend it to anyone looking to analyze sound levels anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Rob A Shetland

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: No problems - works great right out of the box. No batteries required, apparently. I bought it to evaluate an Environmental Impact Review for a loud band.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bob Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very straightforward operation
customer_reviews.text: Insert the battery. Press the large button. That's it, the device is working. Readout is large and easily readable. Press the button again when you are done. The secondary min/max button does not get in the way. That's what I call user friendly interface. It consistently shows the same noise level at the same spots, starting from 33+ dB - not bad for a cheap handheld tool. You have to hold it in your hand while taking samples, because it does not have a flat part to stand on - I think it's intentional, the noise picked up from the surface would get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre Emelianov

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: item came in great condition, I love it! It is being used every day and performs well. Is very easy to use also.
customer_reviews.author: Walter L.

customer_reviews.title: It Did what was asked of it.
customer_reviews.text: Did what I wanted, to monitor a work site noise problem. For an inexpensive meter it did the same job that a much more expensive meter did that was being used by another agency.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: don't know about accuracy bu t unit its fine fr my purposes and the price amazingly cheap
customer_reviews.author: eugene calman

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I used the product to record sound levels on a house located next to freeway. The product was helpful in choosing the most economical noise mitigation methods.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Moffat

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sound level meter to check the decibels in my different tractors and combine. It does exactly what the description said it would. Super easy to use. Love the Min/Max button.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Small, Cheap, Good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat little sound meter that gives pretty good readings, thereby helping to establish relatively accurate noise levels. I use it when our recent neighbors get overly rambunctious in their partying. The difference in response one gets when registering a complaint with the local law such as: "Officer, the peak noise levels from this party go over 95 db A-Weighed, at 200 feet, in a bedroom with no windows towards the noise ..." and the more generic: "Officer the neighbors are driving me nuts with their music." is substantial. Good product for some general applications.
customer_reviews.author: N. Burlakoff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We bought it for a science experiment. It was easy to use and did the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Perret

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and a good price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and a good price. I use it for noise testing in a mine for Msha records. Accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: kevin homeyer

customer_reviews.title: Works great..no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Have had this item for several years now and the product works great no complaints will buy again if i need another one.
customer_reviews.author: scsflash

product_meta.title: Parts Express Mini Digital Sound Level Meter
product_meta.description: Mini digital sound level meter is less than 6" in length making it perfect for your pocket or tool box! Great for measuring and monitoring noise and sound in any environment.
feature_bullets: One-button operation for easy handheld measurements
Large 3/4" backlit display clearly shows your reading
Threaded insert for standard tripod mount
